name: Ansel Health, Inc.
description: Operator of a health insurance platform intended for employers to enhance their employee benefits with a simple supplemental health benefits plan. The company offers insurance services that provide people with cash if they are diagnosed with any of the innumerable covered conditions which are common complications of COVID-19 for anything a person needs on the road to recovery, enabling people to mitigate financial hardships due to serious health issues.
